      • setOpacity

        public final void setOpacity(double opacity)
        Set the initial opacity
        Parameters:
        opacity - - Initial opacity or transparency of layer. Values range from 0.0 to 1.0, where 0.0 is 100% transparent and 1.0 has no transparency. The default value is 1.0.

      • useMapImage

        public final void useMapImage(boolean use)
        Deprecated. 
        Set if should use map image.
        Parameters:
        use - - By default, images are exported in MIME format, and the image is streamed to the client. When useMapImage is set to true, the image is saved to the server, and a JSON formatted response is sent to the client with the URL location of the image. A second call is automatically made to the server to retrieve the image. This methodology is required for secure services that go through a proxy server. In this situation, a map image cannot be streamed. Deprecated at v2.0. Prior to v2.0 this option was used to configure the map to use the proxy all the time. This is not the optimal behavior so at v2.0 the switch to use the proxy will automatically happen if needed.

      • useMapTime

        public final void useMapTime(boolean useMapTime)
        When true, the layer will update its content based on the map's time extent. The default values is true.
        Parameters:
        useMapTime -

      • setVisible

        public final void setVisible(boolean isVisible)
        Set if layer should be initially visible.
        Parameters:
        isVisible - - Initial visibility of the layer. Default is true.
